title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Online Games
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Online Games              Online Games             Web Ranger Challenge activity designed for the middle school level Take the challenge to see if you can complete this activity while you learn more about the dunes.   Â          Water Safety Challenge/Game Play this interactive learning game about water safety and how sandbars affect water depths along Indiana's Lake Michigan beaches. Discover some ways to protect yourself and others during a beach visit. This is an excellent activity to prepare for a visit to the beach.
